name: Healthy Eating Hub
description: A place to share healthy recipes, tips for clean eating, and support each other's wellness journey.

posts.content: Just tried the Hearty Lentil Shepherd's Pie! It's so delicious and filling. Has anyone else made it?

comments.content: I love that one! It's a weekly staple in my house.

name: Italian Cuisine Lovers
description: For everyone passionate about Italian food! Share your favorite pasta dishes, pizza creations, and regional specialties.

name: Spicy Food Fanatics
description: Do you love the heat? This is the group for you. Share recipes that pack a punch and your favorite hot sauces.
